mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of property owned or controlled by the Charlottesville Land Co., Charlottesville, Va. Nov. 29th, 1890 / R.E. Shaw, Engr
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Charlottesville Land Company (Charlottesville, Va.)
Shaw, R. E.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 39 x 66 cm. on sheet 44 x 71 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Descriptive text which follows the title is reproduced from handwritten copy and does not include information about lot sizes and street widths. "Shaw Del." is within the border at lower right corner.
"For full information, apply to John M. White, Secretary, Charlottesville, Va.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Transferred from the Minor and Venable Family Papers, MSS 5660. Negative available - 4x5 - 924-A, with overlay negative 4x5 - 924-B. Published in Albemarle County Historical Society Magazine, v. 33/34, p. 23. See also v. 37/38.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Charlottesville Land Company (Charlottesville, Va.)
